about: This section contains changelog details for the Halloween Website/Dashboard.

articles.title: Version 2.0.0 - August 12, 2025
articles.description: Added new dashboard UI, dark mode, and PDF export. Improved performance and fixed several bugs.

articles.title: Version 1.1.0 - June 30, 2025
articles.description: Introduced analytics integration and user role management. Redesigned login page and fixed date formatting issue.

articles.title: Version 1.0.0 - May 1, 2025
articles.description: Initial release with core features including authentication, data visualization, and report generation.
